claim.claim_preamble: A meeting presentation material management system

claim.body: the communication manager allows files to be compressed and transferred via the network between the portable device and databases associated with respective computer applications.
claim.claim-text: 2. The system of claim 1 , wherein the communication manager allows files to be compressed and transferred via the network between the portable device and databases associated with respective computer applications.

claim.body: the processor is located in the client terminal.
claim.claim-text: 3. The system of claim 1 , wherein the processor is located in the client terminal.

claim.body: the processor is located in the portable device.
claim.claim-text: 4. The system of claim 1 , wherein the processor is located in the portable device.

claim.body: the report includes at least one of biographical information, informational data, a product description, a spreadsheet, a presentation, employee performance tracking data, an invoice, accounts due data, accounts receivable data, projected revenue data, key position data, an organizational chart, an enterprise management report, a headcount, a growth projection, and attrition data.
claim.claim-text: 5. The system of claim 1 , wherein the report includes at least one of biographical information, informational data, a product description, a spreadsheet, a presentation, employee performance tracking data, an invoice, accounts due data, accounts receivable data, projected revenue data, key position data, an organizational chart, an enterprise management report, a headcount, a growth projection, and attrition data.

claim.body: a portable device executes the method.
claim.claim-text: 7. The method of claim 6 , wherein a portable device executes the method.

claim.body: the report includes at least one of biographical information, informational data, a product description, a spreadsheet, a presentation, employee performance tracking data, an invoice, accounts due data, accounts receivable data, projected revenue data, key position data, an organizational chart, an enterprise management report, a headcount, a growth projection, and attrition data.
claim.claim-text: 8. claim.body: the program instructions are stored on a portable device.
claim.claim-text: 10. The medium of claim 9 , wherein the program instructions are stored on a portable device.
